# audioEnvironmentNode

**Instance Property**

The 3D audio mixing node SceneKit uses for positional audio effects.

## Declaration

```swift
var audioEnvironmentNode: AVAudioEnvironmentNode { get }
```

## Discussion

SceneKit uses this audio node to spatialize sounds from [doc://com.apple.scenekit/documentation/SceneKit/SCNAudioPlayer] objects attached to nodes in the scene. You can use this object in conjunction with the [doc://com.apple.scenekit/documentation/SceneKit/SCNSceneRenderer/audioEngine] property to rearrange the audio graph to add other, non-spatialized audio sources or mix in audio processing effects.

## Working With Positional Audio

- **audioListener**: The node representing the listener’s position in the scene for use with positional audio effects.
- **audioEngine**: The audio engine SceneKit uses for playing scene sounds.
